mapper.select: SELECT game_no, game_title, game_price FROM game;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay (game_no, pay_name, pay_phone, pay_type, buy_name, pay_date) SELECT #{game_no}, member_name AS pay_name, member_phone AS pay_phone, #{pay_type}, #{buy_name}, NOW() FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id};
